page.title: 12JUNIORS AT GT. WAKERING SCH.
page.content: THE UPPER JUNIORS CONSISTS OF CHILDREN AGED 9 TO 11.THESE ARE THE 3RD AND 4TH YEAR PUPILS.THE 3RD YEAR CLASSES HAVE BEEN UNDERTAKING STUDIES IN RELATION TO THE DOMESDAY PROJECT.CLASS 4S HAS WRITTEN ABOUT,DRAWN,GROWN AND EXPERIMENTED WITH PLANTS LIKE CRESS,RADISH AND GERANIUMS.ONE CHILD NOTES,"WE CUT A DAFFADIL STEM DOWN THE MIDDLE.THEN WE PUT IT IN RED FOOD DIE. RED LIQUID WAS SEEN TO TRAVEL UP THE STEM." CLASS 4B HAVE STUDIED GREAT WAKERING .HAVING LOOKED AT THE PAST AND PRESENT ENVIRONMENT THEY FOUND,"ST NICHOLAS CHURCH WAS BUILT IN 1100 AD,BUT WITHOUT A CLOCK,IT WAS INSTALLED FOR KING GEORGE V'S CORONATION.THE TOWER IN WHICH IT IS HELD IS NOW BEING RESTORED."
